00089 #define buffer_process(_buffer,_size,_create,_func)  ({                     \
00090         off_t  offset;                                                      \
00091         size_t chunk_size, to_process, size;                                \
00092         void * s_chunk = _buffer->head;                                     \
00093         void * chunk;                                                       \
00094                                                                             \
00095         to_process = _size;                                                 \
00096         offset     = 0;                                                     \
00097                                                                             \
00098         while(to_process > 0){                                              \
00099                 if(s_chunk == NULL){                                        \
00100                         if(_create == 1){                                   \
00101                                 s_chunk = buffer_add_tail_chunk(            \
00102                                         _buffer,                            \
00103                                         to_process                          \
00104                                 );                                          \
00105                         }else{                                              \
00106                                 break;                                      \
00107                         }                                                   \
00108                 }                                                           \
00109                 chunk_size = chunk_get_size(s_chunk);                       \
00110                 chunk      = chunk_get_ptr (s_chunk);                       \
00111                                                                             \
00112                 size = (chunk_size > to_process) ? to_process : chunk_size; \
00113                 _func;                                                      \
00114                                                                             \
00115                 offset     += size;                                         \
00116                 to_process -= size;                                         \
00117                 s_chunk     = chunk_next(s_chunk);                          \
00118         }                                                                   \
00119 })
